description:
While Usopp and Zoro go head-to-head with a couple of animal assassins, Sanji teaches the most beautiful member of CP9 the secrets of making good tea!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akuma no Mi no Chikara! Kaku to Jabra Daihenshin
Devil Fruit Powers! Kaku and Jabra Transform
La trasformazione di Kaku e Jabura
Les pouvoirs du fruit du démon ! Les grandes transformations de Kabu et Jabura !
Силы Дьявольских фруктов! Трансформации Каку и Джабуры
قوى فاكهة الشّيطان! تحوّل كاكو وجابرا!
悪魔の実の力! カクとジャブラ大変身
